choiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, select a facility level organisation unit, data set and a period of your choice in the Data Entry app.

label.h3: What are the three buttons in the green box at the bottom of the data entry form?

div.p: At the bottom of every data entry form there are three buttons: Complete, Incomplete and Run Validation. The Complete button will mark your data set as complete. The Incomplete button reverses the Complete button. The Run Validation button will perform a quality check on your data and show any invalid data.
